items.summary: Update all text color classes in frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx from black (text-black, text-gray-900, text-gray-800) to white (text-white) for all headings, paragraphs, body text, and labels including hero section, problem section, how it works section, stakeholder cards, and impact metrics to ensure visibility against the dark background

Update all text color classes in frontend/src/pages/StudentDashboard.tsx from black to white including sidebar navigation labels, dashboard headings, profile completion text, skill tags, project card titles and descriptions, applied projects list, and mentor messages preview to maintain consistency with the white text theme

Update all text color classes in frontend/src/pages/IndustryDashboard.tsx from black to white including sidebar navigation, dashboard headings, project listings, status indicators, applicant cards, skill match percentages, and analytics section text to ensure uniform white text styling across the dashboard

Update all text color classes in frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx from black to white including sidebar navigation, overview headings, user count metrics, project statistics, revenue data, growth chart labels, and recent activity feed text to maintain the white text theme consistently

Update all text color classes in frontend/src/pages/AISkillMapping.tsx from black to white including page headings, upload box instructions, analyze button labels, AI analysis result headings, extracted skills list, skill strength labels, suggested projects, and match score text to ensure complete white text coverage

Update all text color classes in frontend/src/components/RoleSelectionModal.tsx from black to white including modal title, role selection card titles (Student, Industry Partner, Admin), role descriptions, and any instruction text to maintain white text consistency in the registration flow
